biolockj.util.paths

Interface DockerMountMapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PathMapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicDockerMapper, CommonDockerMapper, SimpleDockerMapper

    public interface DockerMountMapper
extends PathMapper
    Introduced with BioLockJ v1.3.18.
    Author:
    Ivory Blakley

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      String asInnerPath(String path)
      Convert path to inner path form.

      The BioLockJ version that a class was built for and tested with.

    • Method Detail

      • getMap

        TreeMap<String,String> getMap()
                       throws DockerVolCreationException
        The map at represents the connection of inner path to outer path. Value is the inner path, the path form that can be used inside the docker container. Key is the outer path, the path form that represents the path on the host machine.
        Specified by:
        getMap in interface PathMapper
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DockerVolCreationException

      • asInnerPath

        String asInnerPath(String path)
            throws DockerVolCreationException
        Convert path to inner path form.
        Specified by:
        asInnerPath in interface PathMapper
        Parameters:
        path - A path represented as a String, representing the outer path form
        Returns:
        inner path form
        Throws:
        DockerVolCreationException

      • asOuterPath

        String asOuterPath(String path)
            throws DockerVolCreationException
        Convert path to outer path form.
        Specified by:
        asOuterPath in interface PathMapper
        Parameters:
        path - A path represented as a String, representing the inner path form
        Returns:
        outer path form.
        Throws:
        DockerVolCreationException

      • version

        String version()
        Changes to a mapper class should be accompanied by a increment in version. The is a string and open form, but using the major.minor.patch semantic versioning is recommended.
        Returns:

      • builtForVersion

        String builtForVersion()
        The BioLockJ version that a class was built for and tested with.
        Returns:
        the current or previous BioLockJ version
